title: Variables
summary: Variables are named storage locations that hold values. Use them to store numbers, text, and other data so you can reuse or update values.
sample_question: What is a variable and why is it useful?

title: Loops
summary: Loops let you repeat a block of code multiple times. For-loops iterate over a sequence; while-loops run until a condition becomes false.
sample_question: Explain the difference between a for loop and a while loop.

title: Functions
summary: Functions are reusable blocks of code that perform a task and can accept inputs and return outputs.
sample_question: Why would you use a function? Give an example.
